children.subject: It means you cannot add more units until the 3rd week.

By the third week, does that mean I cannot add more units past 20.5 (w/ approval from my advisor) until the 3rd week? Or is it possible to extend my unit ceiling now, all the way up until the 3rd week of the semester?

Exceed maximum units limit
Hello, 

I am trying to enroll in a language class, however I am waitlisted for one of the sections and was hoping I could also join the waitlist for another section to increase my chance of getting into the class. I am currently at my maximum unit limit and am unable to do so. I was wondering if it's possible to temporarily bypass the limit until I am able to know which section I can enroll? 

Thank you so much!
How will we know when we have been approved? Should I be attempting to add past the cap starting next Monday, or wait for some confirmation?

As the first day of the 3rd week is today and we are beginning to review these requests starting today, please allow a few days for us to process the requests. I'm not sure if you're referring to a CS advisor or someone else, but the CS team is just starting this process today. I suggest checking in with your advisor if they're outside CS, e.g. L&S.

This was through my L&S counselor-- should I reach out to my cs advisor instead? My L&S counselor said that I might have to wait for the adjustment period to begin, but it's Monday now and I don't know if the L&S college just hasn't processed it or something else is wrong
Please read the original post for CS vs. L&S.
Are we supposed to be able to add more units today? My advisor said he raised my unit ceiling but I still can't enroll past my unit cap.
Looks like you only just submitted it over the weekend. We will try to get to it before tomorrow's deadline. In future, please plan further ahead.

Charlene says she sent you an email on 2/4. Maybe it went to your spam folder. Your units were increased.

In the future, a better and more direct place to send your questions is cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu. Thanks!
I filled out this form, but I have not yet gotten a response back regarding the extension?

Do you also grant unit limit allowances for summer classes for special circumstances? ( I want to pursue minor in another subject, but can't do so unless I take more classes this summer)...

I have reasonably good academic record though!

history.content:
Requesting Approval to Enroll in More Than 20.5 Units

  • L&S Undeclared students – meet an L&S College Adviser to request an approval for additional units in the third week of the term.  (Note: In most cases, approvals are granted only for those students whose record demonstrates a history of strong academic performance with full course loads.)
  • L&S Computer Science declared students – please fill out this form and your request will be reviewed in the third week of classes.
  • EECS and other College of Engineering Students: Contact your ESS Adviser.
history.subject: Enrolling in More Than 20.5 Units
